sep.gaia.renderer.layer

Class GLResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.renderer.layer.GLResource

  • public class GLResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Each drawable DataResource is prepared for OpenGL by the ResourceAdapter class. The ResourceAdapter holds then the "transformed" TextureResource objects which are ready to be drawn by opengl.
    Author:
    Johannes Bauer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GLResource(java.lang.String key, FloatBoundingBox box)
      Initializes the resource with the textures key and its bounding box in GL-coordinates.
